dcterms:creator: D. -G. Zhang
J.-N. Qiu
T. Zhang
H. Wu
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate a multi-path routing protocol based on link lifetime and energy consumption prediction for mobile edge computing.
dcterms:title: Optimized Route Selection via Red Imported Fire Ants (RIFA) Strategy

dcterms:creator: B. Kacem
S. Mekhilef
N. Sabeur
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on a new routing approach for mobile ad hoc systems utilizing fuzzy Petri nets and ant systems.
dcterms:title: A New Routing Approach for Mobile Ad Hoc Systems Based on Fuzzy Petri Nets and Ant System

dcterms:creator: S. Sankaran
N. Vasudevan
K. R. Devabalaji
T. S. Babu
H. H. Alhelou
T. Yuvaraj
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a recurrent reward-based learning technique for secure neighbor selection in mobile ad-hoc networks.
dcterms:title: A Recurrent Reward Based Learning Technique for Secure Neighbor Selection in Mobile AD-HOC Networks

dcterms:creator: B. K. Panda
U. Bhanja
P. K. Pattnaik
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses obstacle and mobility-aware optimal routing for mobile ad hoc networks.
dcterms:title: Obstacle and mobility aware optimal routing for MANET

dcterms:creator: Shobha
K. Rajanikanth
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on efficient flooding using relay routing in on-demand routing protocols for mobile ad hoc networks.
dcterms:title: Efficient flooding using relay routing in on-demand Routing protocol for Mobile Adhoc Networks

dcterms:creator: H. Yang
Z. Li
Z. Liu
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a method of routing optimization using Continuous Hopfield Neural Network (CHNN) in mobile ad hoc networks.
dcterms:title: A method of routing optimization using CHNN in MANET

dcterms:creator: Taha R. Alsaqour
M. Uddin
M. Abdelhaq
T. Saba
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses an energy-efficient multipath routing protocol for mobile ad-hoc networks using a fitness function.
dcterms:title: Energy efficient multipath routing protocol for mobile ad-hoc network using the fitness function
